page.title: 02WILLESDEN JUNCTION STATION
page.content: {Willesden Junction}is a very old station with a high level line for the North London Line and a low level for local trains.It has 5 platforms but it used to have 17.Many people think that the North London Line is new but it has been there for{100 years.}It was re-launched in May 1985.A new bridge was built for it in 1980 and B.R. are putting on new trains. Willesden is also the main junction for goods train travelling{North. During the day most people use the Watford-Euston line ,many changing at Queen's Park.The peak time train from Watford to Broad Street goes to Liverpool Street instead, as Broad St. is being closed. A survey was done and we found that 66% of passengers used rail to get to work.55% use it daily. Finally, 38% said that the service was good.
